Who is this guy?

Hello! I'm Alpri Else, a student software engineer who believes that seamless software is what empowers humanity to achieve more. I am passionate about creating software that people love using by grounding my work in the problems people face.

I'm a B.S. Computer Science student at the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign (UIUC). I'm also currently pursuing certificates in Software Engineering and Technology Commercialization from UIUC and a certificate in Innovation and Entrepreneurship at Harvard Extension School.

I recently finished a Software Engineering Co-op at HubSpot, a Cambridge, MA based mission driven B2B SaaS company, solving for problems CMS developers faced. And, I will be returning to HubSpot for a Summer 2020 Internship.
